title: (x) Lancome: The sun expert - FF Isonorm 6908 {Stephen}
content:
Does anybody know what Font has been used in Lancome website??   
   
www.lancome.com   
   
Vinod Jain
author: anonymous

comments.content:
Vinod,   
   
Which face? (There are at least 4 on the site...)   
   
Feel free to post a sample of the font. Simply take a "screen shot" of the site and crop the sample you want to show us...   
   
//joe
![:)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419151034im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif) Thanks a ton Joe and Stephen!!!

Vinod - That's Isonorm by Robert Kirchner for FontFont.   
 [http://www.fontfont.de/packages/isonor6908/isonor6908.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419151034/http:/www.fontfont.de/packages/isonor6908/isonor6908.html)   
   
Joe - What would we do without you?   
   
Stephen
